title: Client not loading properly
body: I am having issues with the client. Every time I try and start it up it would give me a black square, I attempted to uninstall and reinstall, and now it is telling me that there is another instance of LoL running. What are my options for possibly fixing this issue?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is not properly connecting to our patching servers and thus, not being able to start correctly. This usually happens if your connection to our servers is *unstable or poor*. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will ensure your local settings are properly configured for League and that there are no surprises there.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.
